sentences.en: ‘Empowerment’ is the new buzz-word in enlightened management circles.
sentences.cn: “授权”是开明的管理层所使用的时髦新语。

sentences.en: Enlightened companies include its human resources in their estimation of the firm's worth.
sentences.cn: 有见识的公司将人力资源包括在公司价值评估中。

sentences.en: Had One - Eye understood English he would have been enlightened.
sentences.cn: 要是独眼人懂得英语,他会茅塞顿开,恍然大悟的.

sentences.en: He enlightened me on the question.
His conversation is so enlightened, so clear.
sentences.cn: 他的谈话是那么有启发性, 那么明白.
他的一番话使我开了窍.

sentences.en: I do know that he was pretty enlightened.
sentences.cn: 我确实知道他是一位非常开明的人.

sentences.en: Listen to both sides and you will be enlightened , heed only one side and you will be benighted.
Mama is very old - fashioned. She's more enlightened than most of them, but she has her limits.
sentences.cn: 妈的思想完全是旧式的,虽然比另外一般人高明一点, 但也高明不了多少.

sentences.en: Melbury did not seem to be particularly enlightened by this explanation.
sentences.cn: 麦尔布礼看来对这个解释并不很明白.

sentences.en: North Carolina has an aggressive enlightened press.
sentences.cn: 北卡罗来纳州的报界是有闯劲的,开明的.

sentences.en: She brought me to the field and enlightened me.
sentences.cn: 她将我领进了这个领域，给我启迪。

sentences.en: The Buddha was amiable and enlightened.
The child thought the world was flat until I enlightened him!
sentences.cn: 这孩子原以为地球是平的,后来我告诉他,他才知道不是.

sentences.en: The teacher's words made me at once become enlightened.
sentences.cn: 老师的一席话使我顿开茅塞.

sentences.en: What she said enlightened all of us.
sentences.cn: 她一讲,大家心里都亮堂了.

words.tran_cn: 使人领悟的；有启发作用的
启发，启蒙；教导，开导；照耀

trans.tran_cn: 开明的，有知识的，有见识的，进步的
trans.tran_en: someone with enlightened attitudes has sensible modern views and treats people fairly and kindly
